example.text: House Republicans under Speaker McCarthy acted early and responsibly in the face of catastrophic debt default; [[user]] and Democrat leadership acted late and irresponsibly, putting American financial security at risk. [[url]]

Montana wins in the bipartisan defense package: Ending the COVID-19 vaccine mandate for servicemembers Protecting women from the military draft Giving military servicemembers a 4.6% pay raise Adjusting the basic allowance for housing (BAH) in high-cost areas to combat the housing shortage for servicemembers Strengthening our national security through establishing a directorate within the Air Force Global Strike Command called the Intercontinental Ballistic Missile (ICBM) Task Force to manage the transition and activation of the new LGM-35A Sentinel ICBM weapon system at Malmstrom Bolstering watercraft inspections to control invasive species such as zebra mussels Expediting hydropower development on Army Corps of Engineers dams As your voice in the United States Senate, I will continue fighting for policies to support Montana servicemembers and strengthen our military. Sincerely, Senator Steve Daines

Happy Water Power Week! Thank you to [[user]] for honoring me with the Legislator of the Year award and for their work to expand this clean, reliable energy resource. The future of hydropower is bright! [[url]]

Allowing the [[user]] to become ground zero for the left’s radical gender ideology by hosting & promoting drag queen performances for children is not just embarrassing, it's a threat to national security and a gross misuse of taxpayer funds. [[url]]

House Republicans under Speaker McCarthy acted early and responsibly in the face of catastrophic debt default; [[user]] and Democrat leadership acted late and irresponsibly, putting American financial security at risk. [[url]]

Dear , In case you missed it, check out my recent interview on Fox News to discuss the Chinese spy balloon that was spotted over Montana and the southern border crisis. The mishandling of the Chinese spy balloon and the southern border are just more examples of projecting weakness on the world stage.

Dear , Last week, I voted to secure several major Montana priorities in the 2023 defense bill. This year's bipartisan defense package ends the overreaching vaccine mandate for Montana servicemembers, includes a well-deserved pay raise for our military, protects women from the draft, and strengthens our nuclear triad to ensure America's military remains the best in the world.
